Message:
a Letter of Summons came
from the Pope for Fortina.

My blood froze,
fearing that she had been
targeted by the Witch Hunt,

but it seemed like she was
being summoned to have
her humanity restored.

it was also written that
I was to accompany her.
Why would it...?

Maybe I’m just overthinking it,
but something doesn’t
feel right here...

We proceeded with caution
as we presented ourselves
to the Pope...

It was then that she started
cursing at Fortina for
being a witch.

I became livid and
challenged her accusations.

But then the Pope
turned her lance on me...
contorting the world
before my very eyes.
